title: Chocolate Cream Layered Dessert

2nd_layer: 1 c whipped cream or Cool Whip
4th_layer: 1 cup whipped cream or Cool Whip

instructions: 1st layer: Combine until butter is cut into pea-size pieces. Press into a 9x13 pan. Bake for 10 mins at 350°. Cool slightly.
2nd layer: Beat the cream cheese and powdered sugar together until mixed well. Then mix 8 oz whipped cream until smooth and creamy. Spread on the cooled crust.
3rd layer: Using mixer at low speed, mix pudding and cold milk about 2 mins. Place in fridge for 10 mins at 350°. Cool. Spread over 2nd layer.
4th layer: Top pudding layer with remaining 8 oz whipped topping. Garnish with chocolate sprinkles.
